original_text: Now to him who is able to establish you in accordance with my gospel, the message I proclaim about Jesus Christ, in keeping with the revelation of the mystery hidden for long ages past,
korean_text: 나의 복음과 예수 그리스도를 전파함은 영세 전부터 감추어졌다가

sentences.original_text: Now to him who is able to establish you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희를 굳건히 세우실 수 있는 그분께

sentences.original_text: the message I proclaim about Jesus Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 예수 그리스도에 대해 전파하는 메시지

sentences.original_text: in keeping with the revelation of the mystery
